alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 2:04AM PST until January 07 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35-45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of eastern, north central and northeast Nevada. * WHEN...Now to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
